5.text: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

6.text: And the sons of Gomer: Ashkenaz, And Diphath, And Togarmah.

7.text: And the sons of Javan: Elishah and Tarshish, Kittim and Rodanim.

8.text: The sons of Ham: Cush and Mizraim, Phut and Canaan.

9.text: And the sons of Cush: Seba And Havilah, And Sabta, And Raama, And Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah: Sheba And Dedan.

10.text: And Cush begot Nimrod: he began to be mighty on the earth.

11.text: —And Mizraim begot the Ludim, and the Anamim, and the Lehabim, and the Naphtuhim,

12.text: and the Pathrusim, and the Casluhim out of whom came the Philistines, and the Caphtorim.

13.text: —And Canaan begot Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,

14.text: and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

15.text: and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

16.text: and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

17.text: The sons of Shem: Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.

18.text: And Arphaxad begot Shelah, And Shelah begot Eber.

19.text: And to Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg, for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother’s name was Joktan.

20.text: And Joktan begot Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

21.text: and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah,

22.text: and Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

23.text: and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab: all these were sons of Joktan.

28.text: The sons of Abraham: Isaac and Ishmael.

29.text: These are their generations: the firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; and Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam;

30.text: Mishma and Dumah; Massa, Hadad, and Tema;

31.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedmah: those are the sons of Ishmael.

32.text: —And the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bore Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan: Sheba and Dedan.

33.text: And the sons of Midian: Ephah, and Epher, and Enoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these were sons of Keturah.

34.text: And Abraham begot Isaac. The sons of Isaac: Esau and Israel.

35.text: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.

36.text: the sons of Eliphaz: Teman And Omar, Zephi And Gatam, Kenaz, And Timna, And Amalek.

37.text: The sons of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

38.text: And the sons of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

39.text: —And the sons of Lotan: Hori and Homam. And Lotan’s sister, Timna.

40.text: the sons of Shobal: Alian, And Manahath, And Ebal, Shephi And Onam. And the sons of Zibeon: Ajah And Anah.

41.text: the sons of Anah: Dishon. And the sons of Dishon: Hamran, And Eshban, And Jithran, And Cheran.

42.text: —The sons of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zaavan, [and] Jaakan.—The sons of Dishan: Uz and Aran.

43.text: And these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before there reigned a king over the children of Israel:—Bela the son of Beor; and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

44.text: And Bela died; and Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

45.text: And Jobab died; and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.

46.text: And Husham died; and Hadad the son of Bedad, who smote Midian in the fields of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.

47.text: And Hadad died; and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.

48.text: And Samlah died; and Saul of Rehoboth on the river reigned in his stead.

49.text: And Saul died; and Baal-hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.

50.text: And Baal-hanan died; and Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel the daughter of Matred, daughter of Mezahab.

51.text: And Hadad died. And the chiefs of Edom were: chief Timna, chief Aliah, chief Jetheth,

52.text: chief Oholibamah, chief Elah, chief Pinon,

53.text: chief Kenaz, chief Teman, chief Mibzar,

54.text: chief Magdiel, chief Iram. These were the chiefs of Edom.
